dict.acceptation: 统一体；（艺术等）完整；（文学、戏剧）（情节、时间和地点的）统一性；团结一致；

sent.orig: Communion is a requirement for unity consciousness and unity based relations.
sent.trans: 交流是统一意识和基于统一之关系产生的前提。

sent.orig: Many comrades have undertaken self-criticism; with unity as the objective unity has been achieved through self-criticism.
sent.trans: 许多同志作了自我批评，从团结的目标出发，经过自我批评，达到了团结。

sent.orig: You should continue to strive for unity, because unity is strength.
sent.trans: 你们应该继续要求统一，因为统一才有力量。

sent.orig: The analytic unity of apperception is possible only under the presupposition of a certain synthetic unity.
sent.trans: 统觉的分析的统一性惟有以某种综合的统一性为前提条件才是可能的。

sent.orig: Unity of oppositeness belongs to philosophy and unity of complementation belongs to Daoism.
sent.trans: 对立统一属于哲学，互补统一属于道学。
